WEATHER FORECAST FOR 22 JULY 2024
Issued at 12.00 noon on 21 July 2024
A  few  showers  may  occur  in  Western  and  Sabaragamuwa  provinces  and  in  Kandy,  Nuwara-Eliya,  Galle  and
Matara districts. Mainly fair weather will prevail elsewhere of the island.
